img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game where a character named "Daoist Mi" is engaged in combat with another character. Daoist Mi is wearing a robe and wielding a sword, poised to strike the opponent, who is dressed in armor and appears to be kneeling or crouching on the ground. The environment is a rocky, autumnal landscape with scattered leaves and grass. The game's interface includes health bars and various icons indicating abilities or items, located in the bottom corners of the screen.
